game.name: HorrorMon Photography
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Photograph hallucinations of monsters to make them disappear. When the monsters become real, defend yourself and take more photos to complete your monster dex!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Photograph hallucinations of monsters to make them disappear. When the monsters become real, defend yourself and take more photos to complete your monster dex!
